title: Hoops Tonight - Remembering Bill Russell, Draymond's looming extension, LeBron's future
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Remembering Bill Russell, Draymond's looming extension, LeBron's future
description:
Jason Timpf remembers Bill Russell after the Celtics legend passed away at age 88, answers whether the Warriors should give Draymond Green a max contract extension, discusses Zion Williamson's weight clause in his contract with the Pelicans, questions what is next for LeBron James with the Los Angeles Lakers, and shares his thoughts on who gets traded first: Kevin Durant or Donovan Mitchell? #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
